meanings.definition: The quality or state of being socially awkward or inept.
meanings.sent1: Her dorkiness was evident when she tripped over her own shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: His dorkiness showed when he couldn't join the conversation smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The dorkiness of his dance moves made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: In a world of elegance, her dorkiness shone like a neon sign.
meanings.sent5: The dorkiness of his jokes made them unforgettable.
meanings.sent6: Despite her dorkiness, she always managed to make people smile.

meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that are considered nerdy or uncool.
meanings.sent1: His collection of comic books was a clear display of his dorkiness.
meanings.sent2: The group laughed at his dorkiness when he started talking about quantum physics.
meanings.sent3: His dorkiness reached new heights when he wore mismatched socks to the party.
meanings.sent4: Among the cool kids, his dorkiness stood out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: The dorkiness of his Star Wars obsession was unmatched.
